REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Addiction counsel
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After recovering from a joywire addiction, [PAWN_nameDef] adopted a non-violent way of life and vowed to help others. Travelling between communities, [PAWN_pronoun] used medicine, arts, and crafts to aid others who struggled with their own addictions.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: AI programmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enlisted in the military's robotics division, developing smarter combat AI. The whole time [PAWN_pronoun] was there, [PAWN_pronoun] never spoke with another human. [PAWN_pronoun] spent all [PAWN_possessive] time conversing with the AI [PAWN_pronoun] was developing.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Army scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] did scientific research for a planetary army. [PAWN_pronoun] studied war scenarios and designed weapon systems to help win battles with a minimum of fuss.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Artificer rampant
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Fuelled by the thrill of discovery and [PAWN_possessive] own megalomania, [PAWN_nameDef] set out to invent new devices and improve existing ones, breaking laws and customs as necessary. [PAWN_pronoun] formed a crew to gather materials for [PAWN_possessive] work - and to deal with outsiders who might interfere.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bandit leader
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] rose up the ranks of the crime organization, eventually becoming the leader of one of their most remote cells of bandits. [PAWN_possessive] dog Rest never left [PAWN_possessive] side.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Behaviour research
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Captured as a feral child, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced into the ways of modern society. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly adapted and became a behavioural researcher, eventually owning a private facility. [PAWN_pronoun] specialized in canines, but learned a great deal about all animals. [PAWN_pronoun] never had interest in plants, however.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Blacksmith shooter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a young blacksmith, [PAWN_nameDef]'s family shop was raided by the police. [PAWN_pronoun] shot two officers before they knocked [PAWN_objective] out and arrested [PAWN_objective]. Sentenced to life in prison, [PAWN_nameDef] learned about traveling and raiding from other criminals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bounty hunter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When the civil war ended, [PAWN_nameDef] had to find a new way to use [PAWN_possessive] fighting skills. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to hunt down war criminals and soon realized that [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed capturing bad guys by any means necessary.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Business gangster
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Staying one step ahead of the law, [PAWN_nameDef] became a legitimate businessperson and silenced anyone who dared say otherwise. As proprietor of brothels, speakeasies and eateries, [PAWN_nameDef]'s good fortune continued while [PAWN_possessive] competition suffered a series of unfortunate and unexplained accidents.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Clone farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Harvesting the products of clone farms is mostly done by the clones themselves - particularly to those whose sims tended towards the social. This clone was one such, who escaped from the farms and headed out to the stars.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Corp researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a leading researcher for a massive space exploration corporation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Crime lord
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Through brutality and cruelty, [PAWN_nameDef] rose to the rank of crime lord. [PAWN_pronoun] relied less on [PAWN_possessive] fists and more on [PAWN_possessive] guns. [PAWN_possessive] reputation spread faster due to [PAWN_possessive] cold-bloodedness and ruthless methods.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Criminal tinker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined a crew of mercenaries, helping to maintain their fusion reactor and nuclear weapons. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly became their leader's right hand and took over when the opportunity arose, connecting the leader's shower to the ship's waste disposal acid.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Defense lawyer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] found that [PAWN_pronoun] could make more money with a quick word than a blaster. Seeking a job where [PAWN_possessive] silver tongue could be useful, [PAWN_pronoun] turned to the law. [PAWN_pronoun] often defended the illegal speeder racers [PAWN_pronoun] grew up with.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Destroyer-general
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] held the rank of Destroyer-General in a powerful midworld military. [PAWN_pronoun] was known for [PAWN_possessive] mastery of weapons, and was also a good ship pilot.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Doomsday pariah
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed to open a vault of otherworldly technology while scavenging a dig site. [PAWN_pronoun] unwittingly triggered a doomsday device that cleansed the planet of all life. More interested in the tech than human life, [PAWN_pronoun] boarded the vault's spacecraft and departed to find more relics to abuse.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Dreaded dude
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Some followers say that [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] crew of misfits found the Fountain of Youth, many, many centuries ago, and that they caused the extinction of the dinosaurs on many planets. There's even a religion about them, somewhere, involving noodles and meatballs.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Energy researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was working on an idea for rapid communication over long distances. [PAWN_pronoun] made an error which destroyed [PAWN_possessive] lab and most of the city. [PAWN_pronoun] fled the planet to escape the authorities.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Envoy of the stars
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] entered the diplomatic corps. Honor and tradition were the values [PAWN_pronoun] took with [PAWN_objective] on every mission. [PAWN_possessive] prestigious position distanced [PAWN_objective] from backbreaking manual labor, allowing [PAWN_objective] to focus on [PAWN_possessive] wordsmithing abilities. [PAWN_pronoun] left the blacksmithing to others.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Executive officer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an executive officer for a large space trading corporation. After a failed attempt at manipulating [PAWN_possessive] way up the corporate ladder, [PAWN_pronoun] was framed for the murder of another executive and her family. [PAWN_pronoun] was found guilty. However, because of [PAWN_possessive] family's influence, [PAWN_pronoun] was exiled instead of put to death.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Exiled researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s love of robotics was not appreciated in [PAWN_possessive] technophobic empire. The High Cardinal of the system excommunicated [PAWN_objective], and [PAWN_pronoun] was never allowed to return.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Faction leader
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Early in [PAWN_possessive] adulthood, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_objective]self surrounded by a gaggle of low-lifes. For fun, [PAWN_pronoun] gathered them and lead them to a certain death. [PAWN_pronoun] knew then that [PAWN_pronoun] had the talent to realize [PAWN_possessive] ambitions of leadership.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fervent researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a young adult, [PAWN_nameDef] was sure that [PAWN_possessive] planet and its people were nearing their time of transcendence. A firm belief that [PAWN_possessive] research would be the catalyst drove [PAWN_objective] to increasingly alarming acts as bureaucrats and bioethics committees worked to stall [PAWN_possessive] progress.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fighter controller
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: During the Zartha crisis, [PAWN_nameDef] fought across many worlds, providing the vital link between the ground and the air as a fighter controller. During the campaign, [PAWN_pronoun] saw friends injured and killed. This mental trauma haunts [PAWN_possessive] dreams to this day, but [PAWN_possessive] aim remains sharp.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Flaneur
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] strolled and sipped [PAWN_possessive] way through the streets and cafes of [PAWN_possessive] world, pursuing freedom at every turn, never becoming attached. Through all this time, [PAWN_pronoun] remained distrustful of others. And never took an order from anyone.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gang boss
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: To survive, [PAWN_nameDef]'s gang often had to rob interstellar traders for food and supplies. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] had to kill the guards. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] had to kill the police who arrived to stop [PAWN_objective]. After years of this, [PAWN_pronoun] became one of the most-wanted criminals in the local stellar empire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gnomebiologist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a xenobiology professor in a glitterworld university. [PAWN_pronoun] went to conferences and managed an art gallery. However, [PAWN_pronoun] never stopped sculpting yard gnomes, and considers this to be [PAWN_possessive] true profession.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Healer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] took the time to admire the beauty of the world. [PAWN_possessive] passive aggressiveness surfaced once in a while, but [PAWN_pronoun] tried to adapt to [PAWN_possessive] changing life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hired gun
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] always wanted to prove [PAWN_pronoun] could make a living without [PAWN_possessive] parents' help. [PAWN_pronoun] did shady jobs that often involved pointing guns at innocent people. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually made enough money to board a cheap freighter. [PAWN_pronoun] discovered why it was so cheap when it crashed.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hunter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master hunter. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to track and trap any animal in the most dangerous of places, and had deep knowledge of many ingenious methods for taking down specific large animals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Intelligence agent
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Because of [PAWN_possessive] hacking skills, [PAWN_nameDef] was recruited by [PAWN_possessive] home planet's governing body to serve as an intelligence agent. The government trained [PAWN_objective] in combat, but [PAWN_pronoun] prefers psychological warfare. Government rules proved too strict for [PAWN_objective], so [PAWN_pronoun] went rogue. [PAWN_possessive] current activities are unknown.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Involuntary hermit
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s escape pod was jettisoned onto an unexplored region of a frontier world. [PAWN_pronoun] eked out a lonely existence with only a herd of muffalo for company. Later, [PAWN_pronoun] was spotted clad in pygmy wombat furs, discussing the importance of hoof hygiene with a group of elderly muffalo.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Lost marine
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Shortly after being promoted to a respected position in [PAWN_possessive] planet's military, [PAWN_nameDef] disappeared without a trace. Later, [PAWN_pronoun] reappeared at the head of [PAWN_possessive] own military force. No one knows why [PAWN_pronoun] became who [PAWN_pronoun] was.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Machine fixer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was adept at dealing with mechanical problems, as long as the problem didn't involve the kitchen. After a life spent around dangerous machinery and flammable chemicals, [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to patch [PAWN_objective]self up pretty well. Despite the pain, [PAWN_pronoun] never learned to dislike fire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mad scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Stripped of [PAWN_possessive] life's work and exiled after [PAWN_possessive] unethical experiments on the survivors of the Callos IX incident were published, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the skills necessary to survive in the outer rim. Continuing [PAWN_possessive] research with nothing left to lose, [PAWN_pronoun] made minions to carry out the tasks that bored [PAWN_objective].

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mad scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s lust for knowledge was only matched by [PAWN_possessive] disdain for anyone who would stand in the way of [PAWN_possessive] research. Traveling from world to world, [PAWN_pronoun] sought answers to questions few dared to ask.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Marble doctor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: On a bomb-blasted world, first aid is often the only aid. [PAWN_nameDef] used [PAWN_possessive] medical skills to help the injured and the sick. [PAWN_pronoun] believed that while guns and machines may be powerful, a doctor is even more so.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Master trader
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master at trading. [PAWN_pronoun] earned [PAWN_possessive] nickname by helping a village through a trying time.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Midworld sailor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined [PAWN_possessive] country's Royal Navy. After years as a non-commissioned officer, [PAWN_pronoun] eventually cracked and used the skills [PAWN_pronoun] had acquired to start a mutiny on [PAWN_possessive] ship. In the end, [PAWN_nameDef] was the leader of a large group of trained and dangerous pirates. [PAWN_pronoun] henceforth always had chefs to cook for [PAWN_objective].

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mutinous captain
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken to the stars by slavers after [PAWN_possessive] tribe was decimated in a raid. Over the years [PAWN_pronoun] learned the language of [PAWN_possessive] captors, eventually working for them as an interpreter and diplomat. The captain only learned of [PAWN_nameDef]'s true cunning when revenge was taken by form of mutiny.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Neuro scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for a long time to improve the world's understanding of the human brain. After succeeding in mapping the whole brain, [PAWN_pronoun] joined a team of scientist on a quest to map the brains of xeno species.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Particle physicist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] performed cutting-edge physics research. [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to help build a better and more peaceful future.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate captain
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked [PAWN_possessive] way up through the ranks of a pirate ship, eventually becoming captain. [PAWN_pronoun] leads [PAWN_possessive] crew between worlds, making a name to remember.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate king
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: With no real care for other people, [PAWN_nameDef] fit in perfectly with the pirate crew that [PAWN_pronoun] had once been a captive of. Shortly after becoming one of the crew, [PAWN_nameDef] began to kill anyone or anything that got in [PAWN_possessive] way - including [PAWN_possessive] crew mates.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate surveyor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a surveyor for Geotek Corporation, [PAWN_nameDef]'s job was to search for new salvage sites. However, [PAWN_possessive] real desire was to find an ancient artifact amongst the ruins to sell on the black market. When [PAWN_pronoun] finally stumbled across one, the company tried to retrieve it by force. [PAWN_nameDef] escaped with [PAWN_possessive] bounty and began a life of piracy.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate trooper
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined a renowned interstellar criminal organization, and was often part of shock-assault boarding parties during starship raids. Though [PAWN_possessive] combat experience made [PAWN_objective] a good fighter, the ruthlessness of the job left [PAWN_objective] cold-hearted and unenthusiastic about social interaction.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a pirate leader, [PAWN_nameDef] was well-known for [PAWN_possessive] cunning plans and chess-like traps. [PAWN_pronoun] was never afraid to sacrifice a few pawns to capture an important target. [PAWN_possessive] name has been linked more then once to strategies that overcame overwhelming odds.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Political activist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was involved with a radical political faction which worked against [PAWN_possessive] homeworld's government. The guerilla tactics training that [PAWN_nameDef] received from [PAWN_possessive] associates gave [PAWN_objective] the skills to fight, but also drove [PAWN_objective] to compromise [PAWN_possessive] own beliefs.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pop idol pirate
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] fans set out as a space pirate crew. [PAWN_pronoun] raided corporations for money and staged performances to spread [PAWN_possessive] name. [PAWN_nameDef] became afraid of fire when a rival burned [PAWN_possessive] stage down. [PAWN_pronoun] relied on [PAWN_possessive] fans to do the work [PAWN_pronoun] found unappealing.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Raider king
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Starting as nothing more than a slave, [PAWN_nameDef] rose quickly among the raider ranks until all knew [PAWN_possessive] name and [PAWN_possessive] ruthlessness.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Religious hierarch
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Ordained as a priest in [PAWN_possessive] local community, [PAWN_nameDef] used intrigue and diplomacy to rise to the higher echelon of the clergy. [PAWN_pronoun] held numerous titles and lands. One day, a merchant landed [PAWN_possessive] spaceship near [PAWN_nameDef]'s home. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to accompany the merchant in search for new worlds and challenges.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Renegade engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After a daring escape from the prison planet with a small crew of fellow inmates, [PAWN_nameDef] set [PAWN_possessive] gaze on [PAWN_possessive] homeworld. [PAWN_pronoun] travelled there, recruited more followers, hijacked a space cruiser, and launched into the void.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Selfless hunter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a hunter of mysterious creatures that many didn't even believe existed. Sometimes the people were right - and sometimes they were wrong. Along the way, [PAWN_pronoun] helped people in need.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Shaman of shadows
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When the monsters of fire came from the sky, [PAWN_nameDef] was called upon by [PAWN_possessive] tribe to guide them into battle. [PAWN_nameDef] made use of medicines and rituals to inspire and lead the warriors of many tribes against the invaders. The pirates were forced to retreat without capturing a single slave.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space explorer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] once spent ten years trapped, alone on an alien planet. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly adapted to the local environment, and learned to communicate with [PAWN_possessive] local enemies. This long period alone left [PAWN_objective] without close friends. [PAWN_possessive] heart is sensitive, but [PAWN_pronoun] learned to hide [PAWN_possessive] emotions very well.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space merchant
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As part of a freelance interplanetary lifestyle, [PAWN_nameDef] sought to dominate [PAWN_possessive] romantic interests as much as [PAWN_possessive] business adversaries. When [PAWN_pronoun] didn't have [PAWN_possessive] own ship to fly, [PAWN_pronoun] worked charter ships for hire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space raider
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the leader of a spaceborne pirate crew. Skipping between the rim worlds, [PAWN_pronoun] became the feared enemy of many settlements.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space trafficker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] discovered [PAWN_pronoun] was heir of [PAWN_possessive] distant uncle's weapons-trading business. To protect the future of the company [PAWN_pronoun] went through extensive military training, in case of any "unforeseen circumstances."

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space traveler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] left [PAWN_possessive] home behind, turning to the stars. [PAWN_pronoun] worked [PAWN_possessive] way from planet to planet, taking on whatever jobs [PAWN_pronoun] could find to earn passage onward, rarely staying with a ship for long. Eventually [PAWN_pronoun] obtained [PAWN_possessive] own vessel and has gradually attracted a quiet but effective crew.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: State engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enrolled in the state weapons research program. While brilliant in [PAWN_possessive] work, [PAWN_pronoun] was so enthusiastic in testing [PAWN_possessive] creations that [PAWN_pronoun] accidentally wounded some colleagues and was marked as unfit for service.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Super soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Product of a super-soldier program run by a now-deposed government, [PAWN_nameDef] was lost. [PAWN_pronoun] survived the final suicide attack on the enemy mothership. What now? For the first time in [PAWN_possessive] life, [PAWN_pronoun] had no orders, no objectives. [PAWN_pronoun] rose from wreckage and strove towards uncertainty, towards freedom.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: System lord
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: For [PAWN_nameDef], ruling a country, or even a planet, was not good enough. [PAWN_pronoun] sought to expand [PAWN_possessive] influence across the system - by legal or extralegal means.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Systems engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Like [PAWN_possessive] father, [PAWN_nameDef] was a systems engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] was qualified in both colony and ship systems. When not working, [PAWN_pronoun] would make mechanical figurines, read old books, or occasionally travel to uncharted worlds. Being introverted, [PAWN_pronoun] did these things mostly alone.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Test subject
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enrolled in a scientific study that promised it could make [PAWN_objective] smarter. Unfortunately, the side effects were very different than [PAWN_pronoun] expected.[PAWN_pronoun] went insane and killed a number of people before escaping [PAWN_possessive] homeworld.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Toaster repairman
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Good with [PAWN_possessive] hands and passionate about technology, [PAWN_nameDef] aspired to invent gadgets and machines that would change [PAWN_possessive] home world forever. A few failed and occasionally disastrous creations later, [PAWN_pronoun] gave up on [PAWN_possessive] dream and took a job more befitting [PAWN_possessive] skill set.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tool mechanic
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a famous tool mechanic on a dusty rim world. After [PAWN_possessive] firm closed due to scandal, [PAWN_pronoun] joined a tribe to survive, crafting fine knives and hammers, traveling, and dealing [PAWN_possessive] wares between settlements.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld enforcer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an enforcer of law on an ancient urbworld. [PAWN_pronoun] dealt with the worst of humanity, from protecting greedy urbworld nobility in their spire palaces to rooting out cannibal cults in the deepest reaches of the underground hive.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld pimp
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: At first, [PAWN_nameDef] made a small profit from selling drugs. Then, [PAWN_pronoun] switched to selling women and made a fortune. [PAWN_pronoun] developed great skills with [PAWN_possessive] fists. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned to fix up the injuries [PAWN_pronoun] inflicted on the girls.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vengeful explorer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A violent drifter without a home, [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] father fought many battles across hundreds of years. [PAWN_pronoun] became a grizzled fighter and crack shot. After [PAWN_possessive] father's death in battle, [PAWN_nameDef] began exploring the stars alone, seeking [PAWN_possessive] father's killer, on the hunt for revenge.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vinho king
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After prohibition came to Aracena VI, [PAWN_nameDef] expanded [PAWN_possessive] underground liquor business until it dominated the market on two continents. They called [PAWN_objective] the Vinho King. Though [PAWN_pronoun] mostly controlled [PAWN_possessive] competition by masterful political maneuvering, [PAWN_pronoun] was not above the occasional beat-down or stiletto assassination.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Voidspace raider
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After years of seeking the assassin that broke up [PAWN_possessive] family, [PAWN_nameDef] was offered a place with a group of space-faring raiders. [PAWN_pronoun] accepted, hoping to find the killer [PAWN_pronoun] sought. Due to [PAWN_possessive] seemingly-unending ability to narrowly escape danger, [PAWN_pronoun] earned the nickname "Blackjack" in recognition of [PAWN_possessive] luck.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wandering crafter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] continued to follow [PAWN_possessive] parents' nomadic ways, supporting [PAWN_objective]self with [PAWN_possessive] crafting skills. But wandering is a hard life, and [PAWN_pronoun] often thought of finding somewhere to settle down and put [PAWN_possessive] skills to good use.
